original_text: Furthermore, Josiah got rid of the mediums and spiritists, the household gods, the idols and all the other detestable things seen in Judah and Jerusalem. This he did to fulfill the requirements of the law written in the book that Hilkiah the priest had discovered in the temple of the Lord.
korean_text: 요시야가 또 유다 땅과 예루살렘에 보이는 신접한 자와 점쟁이 드라빔과 우상과 모든 가증한 것을 다 제거하였으니 이는 대제사장 힐기야가 여호와의 성전에서 발견한 책에 기록된 율법의 말씀을 이루려 함이라

sentences.original_text: Furthermore, Josiah got rid of the mediums
and all the other detestable things
This he did to fulfill the requirements
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 이렇게 한 것은 요구사항을 이루기 위함이었다

sentences.original_text: of the law written in the book
that Hilkiah the priest had discovered
in the temple of the Lord
